title: 17: PhDs and HSP's ft. Mayim Bialik
description:
CALLING ALL HSP’S!
This week Sofia is joined by Mayim Bialik, a four time Emmy Award nominee, Critics’ Choice Award winner, AND a neuroscientist. Safe to say the two have A LOT in common! Together the two discuss the science behind mental health, what it was like growing up as a child star, and how we ALL are on the spectrum of mental illness. But if you know anything about Sofia, you knew she was already a little different. We’re all our own type of crazy. PLUS, they discuss the Madonna-whore Complex. Enjoy!

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
